isis.stitle: AFC 00902 - Incorrect Engine Governed RPM on 2/4/8000 Models Built Between August 5, 1999 and October 28, 1999 with DT 466E Engines, Rated 250 HP, and Allison Transmissions

afc.subject: Incorrect Engine Governed RPM on 2/4/8000 Models Built Between August 5, 1999 and October 28, 1999 with DT 466E Engines, Rated 250 HP, and Allison Transmissions

geninfo.para: 2000/4000/8000 Models built between August 5, 1999 and October 28, 1999 with DT 466E engines, rated 250 HP, and Allison transmissions may experience difficulty upshifting due to an ECM programming error. The engine governer RPM was set at 2400 instead of 2600 RPM resulting in a mis-match with the Allison transmission shift point calibration. To correct this performance issue, the engine ECM must be re-programmed.

note.para: To perform this procedure, the EZ-Tech service tool must be used. The ECM cannot be re-programmed without the EZ-Tech service tool.

Prior to performing the service procedure, use the EZ-Tech service tool with Master Diagnostics Software to verify that the engine high idle setting is programmed at 2450 RPM. If the high idle setting is programmed at 2650 RPM, no further action is required.
When performing the upload/download with NETS 1.6.4 software, you must choose the NETS side, DO NOT CHOOSE the AFC side for this campaign.

specpara.para: To change the engine governed RPM from 2450 to 2650, follow the Programming Instructions attached.

laborinfo.para: Operation number must appear on all claims.

claims.para: Expense is to be charged to Warranty. Claims are to be submitted in the normal manner, making reference to Authorized Field Change Number G-00902.

It is important that the coding be completed properly to assist in processing the warranty claim. Complete instructions will be found in the Warranty Manual, Section 7-1. Special attention should be given to Items 39 through 44.

To assure this important improvement is made in a timely manner, all claims for G-00902 activity must be submitted by February 28, 2001 or within the normal warranty period for the vehicle, if after February 28, 2001.
